playTitle: Carly Reynolds and the S.T.E.A.M. Team

stgdContent.tagContent: (MR. PAXTON nods. Realizing what this is about.)
(MR. PAXTON intermittently smiles and waves as people walk by in the hall.)
(MR. PAXTON tenses up.)
(MR. PAXTON smiles at someone off stage and waves as he moves to join them. CARLY is left on stage in defeat.)

sceneStructure.sceneDescription: LIGHTS UP on MR. PAXTON, a man in his late forties, dressed in a suit and tie. He walks up to a bulletin board and staples a sheet of paper with names written on it to the board. A small crowd surrounds him and tries to look at it. There is a commotion as he steps aside. Boys and Girls alike turn to their friends with various whispers of shock or excitement. After a few moments the crowd begins to dissipate, until only one student is left: CARLY REYNOLDS, a sophomore who is clearly distraught over the news on the paper. She stands there alone for a few moments. CARLY looks over at MR. PAXTON who is still shoving a few items into his briefcase. CARLY hesitantly walks over to him.

stgdContent.tagContent: (CARLY looks up to MS. ALEXANDRIA and shakes her head.)
(CARLY shrugs.)
(MS. ALEXANDRIA hugs CARLY and then leads her to a seat at the desk. She waits for CARLY to start. She doesn't.)
(CARLY shakes her head.)
(MS. ALEXANDRIA looks around to see if anyone else is in the library.)

sceneStructure.sceneDescription: LIGHTS UP ON MS. ALEXANDRIA, a librarian, who is sitting behind a desk, organizing papers, and stamping them. After a moment, CARLY enters.)

stgdContent.tagContent: (MS. ALEXANDRIA pulls a book from the shelf and wipes her arm across the sleeve.)
(MS. ALEXANDRIA hands the book to CARLY, and noticing something offstage, begins to exit.)

(MS. ALEXANDRIA exits. CARLY dusts off the book and looks at it. She opens it up and starts looking through the pages. After a few moments, HEDY LAMARR enters quietly and crosses up behind CARLY, and begins reading over her shoulder for a few moments. CARLY jumps as:)
(CARLY turns around to face HEDY.)
(CARLY backs away from HEDY. HEDY smiles as she does so.)
(CARLY looks at the cover instinctually, then back at HEDY. She poses and looks identical to the picture on the cover.)
(HEDY starts to cross to exit. CARLY turns over the book in her hands and reads the back of the book.)
(HEDY stops at edge of stage and pauses.)
(CARLY seems disappointed.)
(HEDY eyes CARLY closely.)
(HEDY frowns at the mention of her passing.)

(CARLY is skeptical at first, but accepts HEDY's extended arm after a moment. LIGHTS DIM. HEDY and CARLY remain on side of stage as scene transitions and HEDY'S FATHER, walks on stage with his arm outstretched towards HEDY. HEDY reaches out back to him.)
(HEDY'S FATHER is miming how a streetcar works during HEDY's monologue. HEDY let's go of her father's hand and smiles as he leaves. HEDY moves to center dramatically.)
(FRITZ MANDL, Hedy's husband, enters.)
(SALESMAN enters with film canisters. FRITZ buys them all. SALESMAN exits. FRITZ scolds HEDY, who pleads with him to no avail. MUSSOLINI and HITLER enter and join FRITZ in conversation downstage.)
(MAID enters with a tray of coffee.)

(MAID brings tray to HEDY. HEDY points off stage and mimes slipping something in a cup, then convinces MAID to take a sip, who proceeds to faint as HEDY collects the tray and puts on the maid's hairpiece, then she sneaks away. MAID, FRITZ, MUSSOLINI, and HITLER exit when not in focus. HEDY returns to CARLY.)
(HEDY shrugs.)
(GEORGE ANTHEIL enters. He has cocktails in his hands and walk towards HEDY, handing her one.)
(TORPEDO 1 and TORPEDO 2 shoot at SUBMARINE.)
(TORPEDO 3, shoots at SUBMARINE. She tries to jam it, but is unsuccessful. TORPEDO 3 and SUBMARINE "explode" both exit. LIGHTS return to normal.)
(HEDY shrugs.)
(CARLY laughs.)
(HEDY nudges CARLY to show she is just teasing her.)
(CARLY nods. The fact she is truly not on the team finally sinking in.)
(CARLY doesn't know what to say. After a moment of silence, she moves towards Hedy's open book.)
(HEDY goes to the bookshelf, takes a book, and hands it to CARLY. CARLY reads the cover.)
(HEDY smiles.)
(CARLY looks back to the book.)

sceneStructure.sceneTitle: 3. Back of Library - A Few Minutes Later
sceneStructure.sceneDescription: MS. ALEXANDRIA brings CARLY to a new part of the library. The area appears hidden and covered in dust. There is a table with a couple of chairs and a single bookcase with hundreds of books on the shelves. MS. ALEXANDRIA blows the dust off a shelf and begins to search for a book.)

stgdContent.tagContent: (ROSALIND shrugs.)
(CARLY nods, taking it in.)
(CARLY, taken aback, looks back at the book.)
(ROSALIND nods.)
(ROSALIND sighs.)
(CARLY looks back to the book.)
(Silence as CARLY continues to read.)
(CARLY remains silent. After a moment, she continues to read the book.)
(ROSALIND sits back in the chair and waits patiently as CARLY once again starts to read for a few moments.)
(CARLY slowly puts down the book.)
(ROSALIND takes a moment.)
(ROSALIND extends her hand. CARLY gets off the bed and reaches out for it.)
(ROSALIND scoffs.)
(LIGHTS DIM. ROSALIND and CARLY move to the side of the stage as scene transitions)
(RAYMOND GOSLING enters and shakes ROSALIND's hand. Then he leads her into their lab.)
(MAURICE WILKINS enters lab with much confusion.)
(WILKINS storms off stage. WATSON and CRICK enter laughing with each other.)
(ROSALIND nods as she stares at WATSON and CRICK.)
(ROSALIND stands up to give a lecture. WATSON sneaks over and listens.)
(WATSON returns over to CRICK.)
(GOSLING re-enters, and joins ROSALIND. They look at "Photo 51" and then place it in a folder. GOSLING places the folder upstage and exits.)
(WATSON crosses to ROSALIND.)

(WILKINS discovers the folder with “Photo 51”. WATSON runs away. WILKINS stops WATSON. They move off to the side, and WILKINS opens a folder. WATSON's jaw drops. He pulls out a newspaper and draws what he sees and exits. WATSON returns to CRICK. WILKINS exits.)
(LIGHTS return to normal.)
(WATSON, CRICK, and WILKINS enter downstage as SPOTLIGHT appears. WILKINS is facing upstage, and hands the other two awards.)
(ROSALIND remains quiet.)
(ROSALIND nods. WILKINS turns around with her own medal in hand.)
(ROSALIND shrugs.)
(The two sit in silence for a moment.)
(Beat.)
(CARLY nods. ROSALIND reaches for a post-it note on Carly's desk.)
(ROSALIND hands the post-it note to CARLY. CARLY studies it.)
(ROSALIND smiles, stands, and walks off stage. CARLY slowly closes the book.)

sceneStructure.sceneDescription: LIGHTS UP on CARLY in her room sitting on her bed with Rosalind's book in her hand. She takes her time getting comfortable and then opens the book. A few moments pass, and then ROSALIND FRANKLIN enters and sits down quietly in CARLY's computer chair. CARLY doesn't notice ROSALIND at first, and continues reading. When she finally looks up, CARLY jumps in shock.

stgdContent.tagContent: (MR. PAXTON looks confused, and leads CARLY away from the group.)
(MR. PAXTON is beginning to get upset.)
(Behind them, the boys start laughing at something on the computer screen. MR. PAXTON glances over at them impatiently.)

(Behind them, the boys laugh at the screen again. CARLY looks over at them and then back to MR. PAXTON who does not take his eyes from CARLY. CARLY nods her understanding and leaves. MR. PAXTON sighs relief and turns back to the group of boys.)

sceneStructure.sceneTitle: 5. Mr. Paxton's Room - The Next Day
sceneStructure.sceneDescription: LIGHTS UP on a group of boys sitting around a table huddled over a computer. MR. PAXTON is standing alongside them. After a few moments, CARLY enters and walks over to them. MR. PAXTON notices her and flinches in surprise.

stgdContent.tagContent: (MS. ALEXANDRIA looks at the title.)
(CARLY hesitates.)
(CARLY inspects MS. ALEXANDRIA.)
(CARLY smiles and exits. MS. ALEXANDRIA watches her leave, and then looks back at the book in her hand. She opens the book as ROSALIND FRANKLIN enters. MS. ALEXANDRIA looks up to her.)
(MS. ALEXANDRIA and ROSALIND glance the way that CARLY exited.)

sceneStructure.sceneDescription: LIGHTS UP on an empty library. CARLY enters and looks around for anyone. After a moment, MS. ALEXANDRIA enters, yelling off stage.

stgdContent.tagContent: (ROSALYN rolls her eyes and begins pacing on the other side of the room.)
(ROSALYN gestures to BARBARA.)
(CARLY continues to look at BARBARA for clarification.)
(BARBARA shrugs.)
(BARBARA shakes her head. ROSALYN laughs.)
(BARBARA shrugs.)
(BARBARA and ROSALYN share a glance. MR. PAXTON enters with his briefcase, followed closely by MS. ALEXANDRIA.)
(CARLY looks around to ROSALYN and BARBARA, who just shrug, and then back to MR. PAXTON and MS. ALEXANDRIA.)
(MS. ALEXANDRIA storms off flustered. MR. PAXTON notices the books open on the table.)
(MS. ALEXANDRIA returns with a small stack of books.)
(MR. PAXTON eyes CARLY for a moment, and then follows MS. ALEXANDRIA offstage.)
(ROSALYN grabs the briefcase and puts it on the table. CARLY moves to stop her, but she pulls away.)
(ROSALYN ignores them both and removes a notebook from the briefcase and starts rifling through it.)
(BARBARA frowns. She begins flipping through some pages back and forth, and then she looks up at ROSALYN confused.)
(CARLY moves to look at the notebook herself.)
(ROSALYN and BARBARA exchange a glance. Then after a moment, MR. PAXTON walks back in.)
(CARLY jumps and turns around to face MR. PAXTON. Book in hand.)
(MR. PAXTON stuffs the book back into his briefcase. After a moment, he turns to leave.)
(CARLY stands stunned. MR. PAXTON turns and exits.)
(CARLY runs off stage before BARBARA or ROSALYN can even protest. They look at each other and shrug.)

sceneStructure.sceneTitle: 7. Back of Library - A Little Later
sceneStructure.sceneDescription: LIGHTS UP on CARLY, and two women, BARBARA MCCLINTOCK and ROSALYN YALOW, in the library. A few books lie open on desks.

stgdContent.tagContent: (BARBARA nods.)
(BARBARA looks at ROSALYN.)
(CARLY enters with a laptop, some wires, and a few books.)
(They all turn to look at CARLY.)
(CARLY begins to set up her computer while talking with the team.)

sceneStructure.sceneDescription: LIGHTS UP on HEDY LAMARR, ROSALIND FRANKLIN, BARBARA MCCLINTOCK, and ROSALYN YALOW. They are all sitting and standing around a couple of tables in the library, impatiently waiting.

stgdContent.tagContent: (MS. ALEXANDRIA quickly backs out before MR. PAXTON can say anything else. He stands and makes towards the door.)
(CARLY nods.)

(Without waiting, MR. PAXTON exits the room. The second he is away, CARLY springs to action. She takes her laptop from her bag and starts typing away at it furiously. She plugs something in and attaches it to the computer. After some more typing, she gets up and walks to the door and peers out. CARLY steps back in the room and moves to MR. PAXTON's desk and starts flipping through his papers and notebooks. She can't seem to find what she is looking for.)
(CARLY continues to search around desperately when MR. PAXTON returns.)
(CARLY freezes in place. She is caught with papers and notebooks in her hands. MR. PAXTON is furious.)
(MR. PAXTON shows that he had his briefcase on him the entire time.)
(MR. PAXTON continues to look furious for a long beat, and then breaks into laughter.)
(CARLY doesn't move.)
(CARLY jumps a little, but holds her ground.)
(MR. PAXTON looks around to see what CARLY is talking about.)
(MR. PAXTON looks around a bit confused. Still not entirely sure what is going on. He straightens his tie, re-composes himself, and then wanders out of the room. CARLY takes a deep breath of relief.)

sceneStructure.sceneTitle: 9. Mr. Paxton's Room - The Next Afternoon
sceneStructure.sceneDescription: LIGHTS UP on MR. PAXTON at his desk. He is looking at his computer as CARLY walks in. He looks at her, and then gestures to an open seat in the classroom. CARLY takes her seat and puts her backpack on her table. She sits quietly staring straight ahead. MR. PAXTON shoots a few glances her way, but neither say a word. After a long while of nothing being said, MS. ALEXANDRIA pokes her head in the room.

stgdContent.tagContent: (CARLY looks at the back of the book and then opens it. After a few moments, MS. ALEXANDRIA, now HYPATIA enters, dressed in ancient robes.)
(CARLY does not startle, but turns to see MS. ALEXANDRIA.)
(MS. ALEXANDRIA sits down next to CARLY.)
(CARLY looks back at the book. Beat.)
(CARLY nods.)
(MS. ALEXANDRIA gives CARLY a confused look.)
(MS. ALEXANDRIA takes a moment. She is honored.)
(Beat.)
(Beat. MS. ALEXANDRIA hands CARLY the book.)
(MS. ALEXANDRIA smiles at CARLY. She glances off stage and her eyes bug out in shock.)
(MS. ALEXANDRIA storms off stage. CARLY sits laughing at MS. ALEXANDRIA. After a moment, she closes the book.)
END OF ACT

sceneStructure.sceneTitle: 10. Back of Library - The Next Afternoon
sceneStructure.sceneDescription: LIGHTS UP on an empty library. There is a package on one of the tables. CARLY enters with her arms full of books. She begins shelving them into their spots on the bookshelf. After a few moments, she notices the package and investigates it. She looks around to see whom it may be from, but sees no one.
